name: Rebots
storyline:
You’re a new hire at the Rebots Corporation. You’ve been sent to a new exciting frontier known by the locals simply as “The Asteroid Field”. But due to cost cutting your star cruiser had a rough landing and crashed into the local Spaceport. The inhabitants are a bit peeved at you, but it’s hard to tell how much is genuine frustration and what’s them trying to wring glibs out of you. Either way, you’re here now and it’s time to start your new job!

Sybastian is the only other Reboteer in the area and serves as your mentor. He cares for the Spaceport and his job and hopes you’ll do a good job (even though the Corporation forgot about his existence). That’s the extent of your relationship. Previous hires? He doesn’t talk about that.

The spacebus the player uses belongs to Sybastian. He loaned it to you since the star cruiser got busted. It's only suitable for local travel.
summary:
Rebots is where complex automation systems meet wacky!
As a new employee at Rebots Corporation, you’re sent to the remote Asteroid Field to help quirky aliens settle on their rocky little land of choice. They’ve got sass and character, but most importantly, they’ve got a LOT of needs for you to fulfill!

With a bunch of tools, robots, and gizmos, you’ll be able to terraform those dull rocks into flourishing lands. Travel through diverse biomes, gather resources, set up production lines, and get that money rolling into the bank account!
